entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
